questions.text: Who was the female politician that came to Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Janet Eldridge.

	Janet Eldridge was played by Kate Mulgrew. Mulgrew played Mrs. Columbo on a spin-off series of the same name in 1979.

questions.text: What did the female politician give Sam?
questions.explanation:
her private number.

	Sam was hitting on her during her press conference and she showed no interest in him. However, after she left, the man that was with her gave Sam the number, saying she wanted Sam to call her.

questions.text: What was the slogan Diane came up with for the male politician?
questions.explanation:
Wim with Jim.

	Wim was a play on words of the real word Win because the politician's name was Jim. Jim Fleener was played by Max Wright who is probably best known for playing Willie Tanner on "Alf".

questions.text: What Senator from Colorado had a cameo appearance in part 2 of this three-part episode?
questions.explanation:
Gary Hart.

	Gary Hart was a senator from 1975-1987. He went into Cheers in hopes of escaping Diane Chambers who wouldn't stop talking to him. Little did he know that she worked there.

questions.text: How long did Sam say was the longest relationship he ever had?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	His longest relationship was with Diane. However, he really wanted his relationship with Janet to work out.

questions.text: What did the female politician try to talk Sam into doing?
questions.explanation:
firing Diane.

	She felt threatened by Diane. She told Sam that Diane still had feelings for him and for Diane's sake he should fire Diane.

questions.text: Where did Diane get a job?
questions.explanation:
Hurley's Market.

	Diane was a checkout clerk at the market. She said she only took it temporarily while she waited for a better job to come along.

questions.text: Where did Diane hide in Sam's office?
questions.explanation:
under the desk.

	Diane was in the office when Sam and Janet came in. She hid and eavesdropped on their conversation.

questions.text: Who squirted Sam with a water gun?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Sam and Janet were having another press conference. Sam and Diane started making faces at each other, and then Diane squirted him with a water gun.

questions.text: At the end of part 3, who did Sam ask to marry him?
questions.explanation:
We don't know.

	We find out in season 5 who it was, but at the end of this season we were left hanging. Stay tuned for '"Cheers" 5.0 "The Proposal"' to find out who he proposed to.
